code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Journey            as Journey
    participant Ext                as JourneyExtensions
    participant EmptyExcl          as EmptyExcludedWaypoints
    participant Graph              as Graph
    participant CurrentNode        as CurrentNode
    participant Edge               as Edge
    participant NeighborNavigator  as NeighborNavigator
    participant JourneyLegFactory  as JourneyLegFactory
    participant JourneyLegPublisher as JourneyLegPublisher

    %% ---- 1. Extension entry ------------------------------------
    Journey->>Ext: GotoAsync<Node3>(Groupware_IssueTracker)  
    Ext->>Journey: GotoAsync<Node3>(Groupware_IssueTracker) and EmptyExcludedWaypoints.Create(Groupware_KanbanBoard) and token)

    %% ---- 3. Visit starting node --------------------------------
    Journey->>CurrentNode: OnNodeVisitedAsync(Groupware_WikiPage)

    %% ---- 4. Resolve route ---------------------------------------
    Journey->>Graph: GetRoute(Groupware_WikiPage)
    Graph-->>Journey: route

    %% ---- 5. Create journey leg ----------------------------------
    Journey->>JourneyLegFactory: CreateJourneyLeg(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
    JourneyLegFactory-->>Journey: journeyLeg

    %% ---- 6. Publish leg started --------------------------------
    Journey->>JourneyLegPublisher: PublishOnJourneyLegStartedAsync(Groupware_WikiPage)

    %% ---- 7. Navigate through the edges --------------------------
    loop each edge in route.Edges
        Journey->>Edge: edge
        Edge->>NeighborNavigator: MoveNext(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        NeighborNavigator-->>Journey: newNode
        Journey->>CurrentNode: OnNodeVisitedAsync(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        Journey->>journeyLeg: Edges.Enqueue(Groupware_KanbanBoard)
        Journey->>JourneyLegPublisher: PublishOnJourneyLegUpdatedAsync(Groupware_ChatRoom)
    end

    %% ---- 8. Finish the leg --------------------------------------
    Journey->>JourneyLegPublisher: PublishOnJourneyLegCompletedAsync(Groupware_IssueTracker)

    %% ---- 9. Final node visit ------------------------------------
    Journey->>CurrentNode: OnNodeVisitedAsync(Groupware_ChatRoom)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
